title: 20 minute Full Body Dumbbell Workout | Build Muscle, Strength & Burn Fat 🔥
description:
Very effective and intense full body dumbbell workout you can do at home. This resistance training session helps to build muscle and strength using compound movements and a slow to moderate tempo per rep. This workout routine targets the whole body including your legs (hamstrings, quadriceps and calves), glutes (glute minimus, glute medius and gluteus Maximus) it also targets your chest, arms (shoulders, biceps and triceps), back and core (abs). Burn body fat, burn calories and build your muscle in just 20 minutes with this dumbbell full body strength workout.
This session is programmed to benefit every level and includes modifications! Give this workout routine a go, and let me know how you did in the comments! 🔥

Support MrandMrsMuscle by sharing our workouts with friends and family.

comments: Did this workout this morning. I love, love, love your videos❤. I was in heart failure two years ago. I had to strengthen my heart again. Your workouts have helped me tremendously. I went from barely doing these videos to doing them without stopping. These videos are a permanent part of my life and continued recovery. Thank you again!

started on march 2, 2025, I wont lie I couldn't get past 8 minutes, I will not let that discouraged me, i will try to give weekly/biweekly updates on my progress, good luck to everyone going through the journey as well ;)

First time in years that I do a workout with weights. I am obese at 228.8. Not very athletic at all. This was a great beginners workout. I used the modification technique. I hope to master this in another couple of weeks. Will try again the day after tomorrow. THANK YOU for this video. It's inspiring me.

Update: 11/20/23 I am down to 210 lbs. Feeling stronger. Love your videos.
No talking, just straight to business! Love the workouts and the music ❤ Thank you!
